name: Jeepers Creepers
overview: It's Halloween Night and your girlfriend has been kidnapped by an evil wizard who wants to lum her into his undead bride. ! Armed with an unlimited supply of axes, you set out the rescue her, but you'll have to face hordes of skeletons, ghosts and green-skined monsters. ! You must kill them all in order to progress towards the wizard's castle. ! Can you save your love ? This is one halloween night you'll never forget. !
